definition: to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
variant of 出[chu1] (classifier for plays or chapters of classical novels)

sentences.english: Who would exhuming the largest gold?
sentences.chinese: 这次谁将掘出最大的金矿？

sentences.english: His team pulled 10 bodies out of Beichuan'shigh school Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 日本救援队周日在北川中学挖掘出10具尸体。

sentences.english: A nurse anesthetist unearthed a nest.
sentences.chinese: 一名护理麻醉师掘出一套器具。

sentences.english: What can stationmaster dig from inside this caboodle data?
sentences.chinese: 站长可以从这堆数据中挖掘出什么？

sentences.english: The challenge for you is to figure out: well, what do we do with those novels?
sentences.chinese: 你们的挑战是发掘出，我们应该怎么阅读它？

sentences.english: Melvin has even managed to dig up some dirt on the inscrutable Pyongyang Metro —that’s the system’s Puhung station in the photo.
sentences.chinese: 梅尔文甚至还挖掘出了平壤地铁的一点丑事。

sentences.english: He pointed to the upturned furrows of a ploughed field .
sentences.chinese: 他指向耕地翻掘出的犁沟。

sentences.english: I thought that some future Layard might exhume the cornices of the Oxford temples.
sentences.chinese: 我想未来的莱亚德或许会发掘出牛津大学殿堂的飞檐。

sentences.english: The corpse was disinterred and re-examined by the coroner.
sentences.chinese: 尸体被掘出来，由验尸官重新验尸。

sentences.english: Investigations showed that excavated dirt piled next to the building may have caused the collapse.
sentences.chinese: 调查称怀疑倒塌是由于挖掘出的散土堆在建筑附近。

sentences.english: The court granted him permission to disinter the body.
Schliemann excavated the ancient city of Troy.
sentences.chinese: 谢里曼挖掘出特洛伊古城。

sentences.english: They dug many ancient coins out of the tomb.
sentences.chinese: 他们从墓中掘出了许多古钱。

sentences.english: There are lots of tidbits you can extract from your inbox.
sentences.chinese: 从你的收件箱中可以挖掘出很多花絮出来。

sentences.english: The body was exhumed and burned .
sentences.chinese: 尸体从墓中掘出来再予以火化。

sentences.english: The traditional festival involves exhuming body parts and carrying them in a procession to appease Lord Shiva.
sentences.chinese: 传统节日涉及掘出肢体和执行他们在游行安抚湿婆神。

definition: to excavate/to dig out/fig. to investigate (in an archive)
to dig up/to appear in an excavation/unearthed/to come up out of the ground
to dig into/to cut a mine into
to cut (a canal, tunnel, well etc)
